choices: International Business Machines||Internet Business Management||Integrated Business Models||International Banking Methods

text: Which of the following is a key principle of IBM's Code of Conduct?
choices: Always prioritize profit over integrity||Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information||Share company secrets with trusted colleagues||Ignore conflicts of interest

text: What should you do if you witness unethical behavior at work?
choices: Ignore it and move on||Tell your friends about it||Report it to the appropriate authority||Participate in it silently

text: How should you handle confidential customer data?
choices: Store it in a publicly accessible folder||Use strong passwords and encryption||Share it freely with colleagues||Leave it on your desk when not in use

text: What is a conflict of interest?
choices: When you benefit personally from a business decision||When you disagree with your manager||When you work overtime||When you help a colleague
